error.message: Class Drupal\Register_display\Controller\UserPagesController was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.

Parameter $aliasStorage of method Drupal\register_display\RegisterDisplayServices::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorageInterface: \Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorage is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the "path_alias.repository" service instead, or the entity storage handler for the "path_alias" entity type for CRUD methods.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to register_display.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
